sample_name.description: The user-defined name for the sample.
sample_name.label: Collecting Sample id

collecting_institution.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.
collecting_institution.label: Originating Laboratory

examples: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
submitting_institution.description: The name of the agency that generated the sequence.

sample_collection_date.description: The date on which the sample was collected.

Enums: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands [GAZ:00003990]
geo_loc_country.description: The country of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_country.label: Geo Loc Autonomic Country

geo_loc_state.description: The state/province/territory of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_state.label: Geo Loc Autonomic Community

host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.
host_scientific_name.label: Host Scientific Name

host_disease.description: The name of the disease experienced by the host.

sequencing_instrument_model.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.
sequencing_instrument_model.label: Sequencing Instrument Model

sequencing_instrument_platform.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.
sequencing_instrument_platform.label: Sequencing Platforms

submitting_lab_sequence_id.description: Sample ID given by the submitting laboratory

bioproject_umbrella_accession_ENA.description: The INSDC umbrella accession number of the BioProject to which the BioSample belongs.

bioproject_accession_ENA.description: The INSDC accession number of the BioProject(s) to which the BioSample belongs.
bioproject_accession_ENA.label: Bioproject accession ENA

biosample_accession_ENA.description: The identifier assigned to a BioSample in INSDC archives.

sra_accession.description: The Sequence Read Archive (SRA), European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) or DDBJ Sequence Read Archive (DRA) identifier linking raw read data, methodological metadata and quality control metrics submitted to the INSDC.

genBank/ENA/DDBJ_accession.description: The GenBank/ENA/DDBJ identifier assigned to the sequence in the INSDC archives.
genBank/ENA/DDBJ_accession.label: GenBank/ENA/DDBJ accession

gisaid_accession.description: The GISAID accession number assigned to the sequence.
gisaid_accession.label: GISAID Virus Name

virus_name.description: The user-defined GISAID virus name assigned to the sequence.

collecting_institution_email.description: The email address of the contact responsible for follow-up regarding the sample.
collecting_institution_email.label: Originating Laboratory Email

examples: 655 Lab St, Vancouver, British Columbia, V5N 2A2, Canada
collecting_institution_address.description: The mailing address of the agency submitting the sample.

submitting_institution_email.description: The email address of the contact responsible for follow-up regarding the sequence.

examples: 123 Sunnybrooke St, Toronto, Ontario, M4P 1L6, Canada
submitting_institution_address.description: The mailing address of the agency submitting the sequence.

sample_received_date.description: The date on which the sample was received.

shipping_date.description: The date on which the sample was sent.
shipping_date.label: Shipping Date

results_emission_date.description: The date on which the results were emitted.
results_emission_date.label: Results Emission Date

geo_loc_region.description: The county/region of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_region.label: Geo Loc Province

geo_loc_city.description: The city of origin of the sample.
geo_loc_city.label: Geo Loc City

geo_loc_latitude.description: The latitude coordinates of the geographical location of sample collection.
geo_loc_latitude.label: Geo Loc Latitude

geo_loc_longitude.description: The longitude coordinates of the geographical location of sample collection.
geo_loc_longitude.label: Geo Loc Longitude

anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.
anatomical_material.label: Organism Substance

anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.
anatomical_part.label: Anatomical Structure

body_product.description: A substance excreted/secreted from an organism e.g. feces, urine, sweat.
body_product.label: Body product

environmental_material.description: A substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment e.g. soil, water, sewage, door handle, bed handrail, face mask.
environmental_material.label: Environmental Material

environmental_site.description: An environmental location may describe a site in the natural or built environment e.g. hospital, wet market, bat cave.
environmental_site.label: Anthropogenic Geographic Feature

collection_device.description: The instrument or container used to collect the sample e.g. swab.
collection_device.label: Collection Device

collection_method.description: The process used to collect the sample e.g. phlebotomy, necropsy.
collection_method.label: Collection Method

collection_protocol.description: The name and version of a particular protocol used for sampling.
collection_protocol.label: Collection Protocol

specimen_processing.description: Any processing applied to the sample during or after receiving the sample.
specimen_processing.label: Specimen Processing

lab_host.description: Name and description of the laboratory host used to propagate the source organism or material from which the sample was obtained.
lab_host.label: Lab passage Host

examples: AVL buffer+30%EtOH lysate received from Respiratory Lab. P3 passage in Vero-1 via bioreactor large-scale batch passage. P3 batch derived from the SP-2/reference lab strain.
passage_method.description: Description of how organism was passaged.
passage_method.label: Passage Method

biomaterial_extracted.description: The biomaterial extracted from samples for the purpose of sequencing.
biomaterial_extracted.label: Biomaterial Extracted

tax_id.description: The NCBITaxon identifier for the organism being sequenced.
tax_id.label: Tax ID

host_common_name.description: The commonly used name of the host.
host_common_name.label: Host Common Name

examples: Date, Location e.g. type of gathering, Family cluster, etc.
outbreak.description: If the information is unknown or can not be shared, leave blank.
outbreak.label: Outbreak Exposure Event Location

examples: e.g. Patient infected while traveling in â€¦.
additional_host_information.description: If the information is unknown or can not be shared, leave blank.
additional_host_information.label: Additional Host Information

Enums: Sample has epidemiological link to Variant of Concern (VoC) [GENEPIO:0100273]
Sample has epidemiological link to Omicron Variant [GENEPIO:0100274]

Surveillance of international border crossing by air travel [GENEPIO:0100016]
Surveillance of international border crossing by ground transport [GENEPIO:0100017]
purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.
purpose_of_sequencing.label: Purpose of Sequencing

Enums: Screened for S gene target failure (S dropout)
Screened due to close contact with infected individual
purpose_of_sequencing_details.description: The description of why the sample was sequenced providing specific details.
examples: Screened for S gene target failure (S dropout)
purpose_of_sequencing_details.label: Purpose Of Sequencing Details

sequencing_date.description: The date the sample was sequenced.
sequencing_date.label: Sequencing date

library_id.description: The user-specified identifier for the library prepared for sequencing.

if_enrichment_protocol_is_other_specify.label: If Enrichment Protocol Is Other, Specify

if_amplicon_protocol_if_other_especify.labe: If Amplicon Protocol If Other, Especify

amplicon_size.description: The length of the amplicon generated by PCR amplification.
amplicon_size.label: Amplicon Size

library_preparation_kit.description: The name of the DNA library preparation kit used to generate the library being sequenced.
library_preparation_kit.label: Library Preparation Kit

flow_cell_barcode.description: The barcode of the flow cell used for sequencing.
flow_cell_barcode.label: Flow Cell Barcode

sequencing_protocol_name.description: The name and version number of the sequencing protocol used.
sequencing_protocol_name.label: Sequencing Protocol Name

examples: Genomes were generated through amplicon sequencing of 1200 bp amplicons with Freed schema primers. Libraries were created using Illumina DNA Prep kits, and sequence data was produced using Miseq Micro v2 (500 cycles) sequencing kits.
sequencing_protocol.description: The protocol used to generate the sequence.
sequencing_protocol.label: Sequencing Protocol

amplicon_pcr_primer_scheme.description: The specifications of the primers (primer sequences, binding positions, fragment size generated etc) used to generate the amplicons to be sequenced.
amplicon_pcr_primer_scheme.label: Amplicon Pcr Primer Scheme

raw_sequence_data_processing_method.description: The method used for raw data processing such as removing barcodes, adapter trimming, filtering etc.
raw_sequence_data_processing_method.label: Raw sequence data processin method

dehosting_method.description: The method used to remove host reads from the pathogen sequence.
dehosting_method.label: Dehosting Method

if_variant_calling_other.label: If variant calling Is Other, Specify

consensus_sequence_filepath.description: The filepath of the consesnsus sequence file.
consensus_sequence_filepath.label: Consensus sequence filepath

consensus_sequence_software_name.description: The name of software used to generate the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_software_name.label: Consensus sequence software name

if_consensus_other.description: The version of the software used to generate the consensus sequence.
if_consensus_other.label: If consensus Is Other, Specify

consensus_sequence_software_version.description: The version of the software used to generate the consensus sequence.
consensus_sequence_software_version.label: Consensus sequence software version

breadth_of_coverage_value.description: The percentage of the reference genome covered by the sequenced data, to a prescribed depth.
breadth_of_coverage_value.label: Breadth of coverage value

depth_of_coverage_value.description: The average number of reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.
depth_of_coverage_value.label: Depth of coverage value

depth_of_coverage_threshold.description: The threshold used as a cut-off for the depth of coverage.
depth_of_coverage_threshold.label: Depth of coverage threshold

sequence_file_R1_fastq.description: The user-specified filename of the r1 FASTQ file.
sequence_file_R1_fastq.label: Sequence file R1 fastq

sequence_file_R2_fastq.description: The user-specified filename of the r2 FASTQ file.
sequence_file_R2_fastq.label: Sequence file R2 fastq

r1_fastq_filepath.description: The filepath of the r1 FASTQ file.
r1_fastq_filepath.label: Filepath R1 fastq

r2_fastq_filepath.description: The filepath of the r2 FASTQ file.
r2_fastq_filepath.label: Filepath R2 fastq

fast5_filename.description: The user-specified filename of the FAST5 file.
fast5_filename.label: Filename fast5

fast5_filepath.description: The filepath of the FAST5 file.
fast5_filepath.label: Filepath fast5

number_of_base_pairs_sequenced.description: The number of total base pairs generated by the sequencing process.
number_of_base_pairs_sequenced.label: Number of base pairs sequenced

consensus_genome_length.description: Size of the assembled genome described as the number of base pairs.
consensus_genome_length.label: Consensus genome length

ns_per_100_kbp.description: The number of N symbols present in the consensus fasta sequence, per 100kbp of sequence.
ns_per_100_kbp.label: Ns per 100 kbp

reference_genome_accession.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.
reference_genome_accession.label: Reference genome accession

bioinformatics_protocol.description: The name  of the bioinformatics protocol used.
bioinformatics_protocol.label: Bioinformatics protocol

if_bioinformatic_protocol_is_other_speci.description: The name  of the bioinformatics protocol used.
if_bioinformatic_protocol_is_other_speci.label: If bioinformatic protocol Is Other, Specify

bioinformatic_protocol_version.description: The version number of the bioinformatics protocol used.
bioinformatic_protocol_version.label: bioinformatics protocol version

lineage/clade_name.description: The name of the lineage or clade.
lineage/clade_name.label: Lineage/clade name

lineage/clade_analysis_software_name.description: The name of the software used to determine the lineage/clade.
lineage/clade_analysis_software_name.label: lineage/clade analysis software name

if_lineage_identification_other.description: The name of the software used to determine the lineage/clade.
if_lineage_identification_other.label: If lineage identification Is Other, Specify

lineage/clade_analysis_software_version.description: The version of the software used to determine the lineage/clade.
lineage/clade_analysis_software_version.label: Lineage/clade analysis software version

variant_designation.description: The variant classification of the lineage/clade i.e. variant, variant of concern.
variant_designation.label: Variant designation

examples: lineage-defining mutations: ORF1ab (K1655N), Spike (K417N, E484K, N501Y, D614G, A701V), N (T205I), E (P71L)
variant_evidence.description: The evidence used to make the variant determination.
variant_evidence.label: Variant evidence

gene_name_1.description: The name of the gene used in the diagnostic RT-PCR test.
gene_name_1.label: Gene Name 1

diagnostic_pcr_protocol_1.description: The name and version number of the protocol used for diagnostic marker amplification.
diagnostic_pcr_protocol_1.label: Diagnostic Pcr Protocol 1

diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_1.description: The Ct value result from a diagnostic SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR test.
diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_1.label: Diagnostic Pcr Ct Value 1

gene_name_2.description: The name of the gene used in the diagnostic RT-PCR test.
gene_name_2.label: Gene Name 2

diagnostic_pcr_protocol_2.description: The name and version number of the protocol used for diagnostic marker amplification.
diagnostic_pcr_protocol_2.label: Diagnostic Pcr Protocol 2

diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_2.description: The cycle threshold (CT) value result from a diagnostic SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR test.
diagnostic_pcr_Ct_value_2.label: Diagnostic Pcr Ct Value-2

common_name.description: The common name of the organism.

Enums: MBD2 protein methyl-CpG binding domain method [GENPIO:0001951]
library_source.description: Molecule type used to make the library.
library_source.label: Source material

examples: e.g Illumina MiSeq paired end sequencing
experiment_title.label: Experiment title

examples: e.g SARS-CoV-2 genomes from late April in Stockholm
study_title.label: Study title
